movies.title: Dune: Part One
movies.plot: Paul Atreides arrives on Arrakis after his father accepts the stewardship of the dangerous planet. However, chaos ensues after a betrayal as forces clash to control melange, a precious resource.

poster.caption: Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Rebecca Ferguson, Jason Momoa, Sharon Duncan-Brewster, Oscar Isaac, Timothée Chalamet, and Zendaya in Dune: Part One (2021)

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.plot: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

poster.caption: Willem Dafoe, Alfred Molina, Thomas Haden Church, Jamie Foxx, Rhys Ifans, Benedict Cumberbatch, Zendaya, and Tom Holland in Spider-Man: No Way Home (2021)

movies.title: Don't Look Up
movies.plot: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn humankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

poster.caption: Leonardo DiCaprio, Ron Perlman, Meryl Streep, Cate Blanchett, Mark Rylance, Tyler Perry, Jonah Hill, Rob Morgan, Jennifer Lawrence, Timothée Chalamet, Kid Cudi, and Ariana Grande in Don't Look Up (2021)

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.originalTitle: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.plot: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

poster.caption: Tim Roth, Michelle Yeoh, Tony Leung Chiu-wai, Benedict Wong, Meng'er Zhang, Simu Liu, Awkwafina, and Florian Munteanu in Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings (2021)

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.plot: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

poster.caption: Daniel Craig in No Time to Die (2021)

movies.title: Free Guy
movies.plot: When Guy, a bank teller, learns that he is a non-player character in a bloodthirsty, open-world video game, he goes on to become the hero of the story and takes the responsibility of saving the world.

poster.caption: Ryan Reynolds, Taika Waititi, Dwayne Johnson, Utkarsh Ambudkar, Lil Rel Howery, Jodie Comer, Owen Burke, and Joe Keery in Free Guy (2021)

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.plot: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

poster.caption: Rachel Weisz, Scarlett Johansson, Ray Winstone, David Harbour, O-T Fagbenle, Olga Kurylenko, and Florence Pugh in Black Widow (2021)

movies.title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
movies.plot: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

poster.caption: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Jason Momoa, Gal Gadot, Ezra Miller, and Ray Fisher in Zack Snyder's Justice League (2021)

movies.title: The Suicide Squad
movies.plot: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker, and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X as they are dropped off at the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.

poster.caption: Sylvester Stallone, Steve Agee, Idris Elba, John Cena, Joel Kinnaman, David Dastmalchian, Margot Robbie, and Daniela Melchior in The Suicide Squad (2021)

movies.title: Eternals
movies.plot: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

poster.caption: Salma Hayek, Angelina Jolie, Richard Madden, Gemma Chan, Ma Dong-seok, Brian Tyree Henry, Kit Harington, Kumail Nanjiani, Lauren Ridloff, Barry Keoghan, and Lia McHugh in Eternals (2021)

movies.title: Nobody
movies.plot: A docile family man slowly reveals his true character after his house gets burgled by two petty thieves, which, coincidentally, leads him into a bloody war with a Russian crime boss.

poster.caption: Bob Odenkirk in Nobody (2021)

movies.title: Red Notice
movies.plot: An Interpol agent successfully tracks down the world's most wanted art thief with help from a rival thief. But nothing is as it seems as a series of double-crosses ensues.

poster.caption: Ryan Reynolds, Dwayne Johnson, and Gal Gadot in Red Notice (2021)

movies.title: The Matrix Resurrections
movies.plot: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To find out if his reality is a construct, to truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.

poster.caption: Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Eréndira Ibarra, Jessica Henwick, and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II in The Matrix Resurrections (2021)

movies.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
movies.plot: Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.

movies.title: Encanto
movies.plot: An extraordinary family, the Madrigals, live hidden in the mountains of Colombia, in a magical house called an Encanto. The magic of the Encanto has blessed every child in the family with a unique gift - every child except one, Mirabel.

movies.title: Cruella
movies.plot: During the 1970s London punk rock revolution, young grifter Estella transforms herself into the raucous, revenge-bent Cruella de Vil.

poster.caption: Emma Stone in Cruella (2021)

movies.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
movies.plot: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against each other--the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong--with humanity caught in the balance.

poster.caption: Godzilla vs. Kong (2021)

movies.title: The Black Phone
movies.plot: After being abducted and locked in a basement, a boy starts receiving calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.

poster.caption: Ethan Hawke in The Black Phone (2021)

movies.title: The Tomorrow War
movies.plot: A family man travels to the year 2051 to join a global war against a deadly alien species.

poster.caption: Chris Pratt and Yvonne Strahovski in The Tomorrow War (2021)

movies.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
movies.plot: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

poster.caption: Paul Rudd, Logan Kim, Mckenna Grace, Finn Wolfhard, and Celeste O'Connor in Ghostbusters: Afterlife (2021)

movies.title: Wrath of Man
movies.plot: A mysteriously stoic character is hired as a security guard by a cash truck company responsible for transporting a lot of money around Los Angeles each week.

poster.caption: Jason Statham in Wrath of Man (2021)

movies.title: Jai Bhim
movies.plot: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

poster.caption: Suriya and Lijo Mol Jose in Jai Bhim (2021)

movies.title: Jungle Cruise
movies.plot: A small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals.

poster.caption: Paul Giamatti, Dwayne Johnson, Jesse Plemons, Edgar Ramírez, Emily Blunt, and Jack Whitehall in Jungle Cruise (2021)

movies.title: The Power of the Dog
movies.plot: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

poster.caption: Benedict Cumberbatch in The Power of the Dog (2021)

movies.title: Luca
movies.plot: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

poster.caption: Marco Barricelli, Jim Gaffigan, Maya Rudolph, Peter Sohn, Emma Berman, Jacob Tremblay, Jack Dylan Grazer, and Saverio Raimondo in Luca (2021)

movies.title: The Last Duel
movies.plot: The Knight Jean de Carrouges must settle the dispute over his wife Marguerite by challenging his former friend to a duel to the death.

poster.caption: Ben Affleck, Matt Damon, Jodie Comer, and Adam Driver in The Last Duel (2021)

movies.title: CODA
movies.plot: When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her musical passion and her fear of abandoning her deaf parents.

poster.caption: Marlee Matlin, Troy Kotsur, Daniel Durant, and Emilia Jones in CODA (2021)

movies.title: Mortal Kombat
movies.plot: MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.

poster.caption: Hiroyuki Sanada and Joe Taslim in Mortal Kombat (2021)

movies.title: Army of the Dead
movies.plot: Following a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries take the ultimate gamble, venturing into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.

poster.caption: Ana de la Reguera, Matthias Schweighöfer, Omari Hardwick, Dave Bautista, and Ella Purnell in Army of the Dead (2021)

movies.title: Last Night in Soho
movies.plot: Aspiring fashion designer Eloise is mysteriously able to return to 1960s London, where she encounters dazzling wannabe singer Sandie. But the glamour is not as it seems, and the dreams of the past crack and splinter into something darker.

poster.caption: Terence Stamp, Matt Smith, Michael Ajao, Thomasin McKenzie, and Anya Taylor-Joy in Last Night in Soho (2021)

movies.title: The King's Man
movies.plot: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions of people.

poster.caption: Ralph Fiennes, Djimon Hounsou, Rhys Ifans, Gemma Arterton, and Harris Dickinson in The King's Man (2021)

movies.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
movies.plot: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

poster.caption: Alan Tudyk, Benedict Wong, Gemma Chan, Kelly Marie Tran, Awkwafina, Thalia Tran, and Izaac Wang in Raya and the Last Dragon (2021)

movies.title: Old
movies.plot: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

movies.plot: An honest cop is determined to bring down a corrupt drug mafia, who targets youth to drive towards drug addiction.

poster.caption: Jackie Shroff, Salman Khan, and Disha Patani in Radhe (2021)

movies.title: Nightmare Alley
movies.plot: A grifter working his way up from low-ranking carnival worker to lauded psychic medium matches wits with a psychologist bent on exposing him.

movies.title: F9: The Fast Saga
movies.plot: Dom and the crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother.

movies.title: House of Gucci
movies.plot: When Patrizia Reggiani, an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel their legacy and triggers a reckless spiral of betrayal, decadence, revenge, and ultimately...murder.

movies.title: The Guilty
movies.plot: A demoted police officer assigned to a call dispatch desk is conflicted when he receives an emergency phone call from a kidnapped woman.

movies.title: King Richard
movies.plot: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard.

movies.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
movies.originalTitle: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It
movies.plot: Arne Cheyenne Johnson stabs and murders his landlord, claiming to be under demonic possession while Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate the case and try to prove his innocence.

movies.plot: A collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine" comes to life in a fictional twentieth century French city.

poster.caption: Denzel Washington, Jared Leto, and Rami Malek in The Little Things (2021)

movies.title: Shershaah
movies.plot: Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

movies.title: The Green Knight
movies.plot: A fantasy retelling of the medieval story of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.

poster.caption: Dev Patel in The Green Knight (2021)

movies.title: tick, tick... BOOM!
movies.plot: On the brink of turning 30, a promising theater composer navigates love, friendship and the pressure to create something great before time runs out.

movies.plot: A woman is released from prison after serving a sentence for a violent crime and re-enters a society that refuses to forgive her past.

poster.caption: Sandra Bullock in The Unforgivable (2021)

movies.title: The Worst Person in the World
movies.plot: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.

movies.title: West Side Story
